channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: prediction of probability to fail
item.description: Prediction in Cox regression with stackexchange How can I obtain prediction intervals for survival prediction in the Cox model? with stackexchange detailed pdf of General theory and r code for cox model Calculating survival probability per person at time (t) from Cox PH with stats.stackexchange How to use r to compute confidence interval for a given age with predictCox package

item.title: Tips to produce graphics
item.description: Nice and constructive graphics play an important role when it comes to conveying a message. I personnaly use R with ggplot2, a graphic package. the main advantages of ggplot is that is come with a grammar, a series of rules which once learn, make it very easy to create new plots. Thus I recommend to learn ggplot when starting to use R. It is time consuming at first and the curve it steep but it is totally worth in the long term.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a researcher in applied mathematics working at the university of Exeter. I am interested by the use of statistic and machine learning to improve clinical practice. I am currently working on the prediction of Type 1 diabetes thanks to JDRF sponsoring and my aim is to develop tools to identify children who are likely to develop type 1 diabetes and give them an adequate follow up.
